notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
notFound.suggestion: Please check the URL or return to the homepage to continue browsing.
notFound.helpText: If this problem persists, please contact our support team.

forbidden.title: Access Denied
forbidden.description: You don't have permission to access this page.
forbidden.suggestion: Please verify that you have the necessary permissions.
forbidden.warningMessage: Access to this resource requires proper authentication credentials or permissions.
forbidden.helpText: For access permission issues, please contact your administrator.

internalServerError.title: Internal Server Error
internalServerError.description: Sorry, an unexpected error occurred on our server.
internalServerError.suggestion: Please try again in a moment.
internalServerError.helpText: If the problem persists, please contact technical support.

serviceUnavailable.title: Service Unavailable
serviceUnavailable.description: The service is currently under maintenance or temporarily unavailable.
serviceUnavailable.suggestion: Please wait a moment and try again.
serviceUnavailable.helpText: For maintenance information, please check our official status page.
